org.apache.nemo.common.coder

Interface EncoderFactory<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - element type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeamEncoderFactory, BytesEncoderFactory, EncoderFactory.DummyEncoderFactory, IntEncoderFactory, LongEncoderFactory, NemoEventEncoderFactory, PairEncoderFactory, SparkEncoderFactory

    public interface EncoderFactory<T>
extends Serializable
    A encoder factory object which generates encoders that encode values of type T into byte streams. To avoid to generate instance-based coder such as Spark serializer for every encoding, user need to explicitly instantiate an encoder instance and use it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  EncoderFactory.DummyEncoderFactory
      Dummy encoder factory implementation which is not supposed to be used.
      static interface  EncoderFactory.Encoder<T>
      Interface of Encoder.

      • create

        EncoderFactory.Encoder<T> create(OutputStream outputStream)
                          throws IOException
        Get an encoder instance.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the stream on which encoded bytes are written
        Returns:
        the encoder instance.
